name: I know some good games we could play
trans: 我知道一些我们可以玩的好游戏

name: A lot of good tricks. I will show them to you.
trans: 很多好的把戏。我会向你们展示

name: Your mother Will not mind at all if I do.
trans: 如果我这样做，你们的妈妈一点也不介意。

name: Then Sally and I did not know what to say.
trans: 那时萨莉和我都不知道说什么。

name: Our mother was out of the house For the day.
trans: 我们母亲整天都不在家

name: Make that cat go away!
trans: 让那只猫走开!

name: When your mother is out.
trans: 当你们妈妈不在家时

name: He should not be here.
trans: 他不应该在这里

name: He should not be about.
trans: 他不应该在这里晃来晃去

name: Have no fear.
trans: 别害怕

name: My tricks are not bad
trans: 我的把戏并不坏

name: We can have lots of good fun, if you wash.
trans: 如果你愿意的话，我们可以玩的很开心。

name: Put me down.
trans: 放我下来。

name: This is no fun at all!
trans: 这根本就不好玩！

name: I do not wish to fall.
trans: 我不想摔倒。

name: I will not let you fall.
trans: 我不会让你摔倒的

name: I will hold you up high.
trans: 我会把你高高举起。

name: I stand on the ball.
trans: 我站在球上。

name: But that is not all I can do.
trans: 但这不是我所能做的全部。

name: I know it is wet And the sun is not sunny.
trans: 我知道外面很湿，太阳也不明媚

name: But we can have Lots of good fun that is funny!
trans: 但我们可以拥有许多有趣的欢乐时光！

name: Way do you sit there like that?
trans: 你们为什么那样坐在那儿？

name: Then we saw him step in on the mat!
trans: 然后我们看到他踏上门垫走了进来

name: I know some new tricks
trans: 我知道一些新把戏.

name: Then we saw him step in on the mat!
trans: 然后，我们看到它踩在垫子上!

name: How that bump made us jump
trans: 那撞击声让我们跳起来

name: Something went bump.
trans: 一些东西发出了撞击声.

name: little bit
trans: 一点点.

name: I can’t blab such blibber blubber.
trans: 我说不了那么拗口的句子

name: I’ll find it something it can say.
trans:
我来找点儿它能说的东西_x000D_
Well then.. bring your mouth this way.那好吧…带上你的嘴巴往这边走

name:
My poor mouth is much too slow我可怜的嘴巴根本跟不上_x000D_
My poor mouth can’t say that.
trans: 我可怜的嘴巴，根本说不了那些

name: Bim and Ben lead bands with brooms.
trans: bim和ben都用扫帚指挥

name: Ben bends Bim’s broom.
trans: Ben弄弯了bim的扫帚

name: Bim brings Ben broom.
trans: Bim给Ben拿来了扫帚

name: Let’s have a little talk about tweetle beetles.
trans: 让我们来聊一聊啾啾叫的甲虫吧.

name: I can’t say such silly stuff.
trans: 我说不了这些愚蠢话

name: That’s enough, sir.
trans: 够了，先生。

name: You don’t have to be so dumb now.
trans: 你现在不必默不作声了

name: My tongue isn’t made of rubber.
trans: 我的舌头不是橡皮做的

name: I can’t blab such blibber blubber!
trans: 我说不了这么拗口的句子.

name: Duck takes licks in lakes Luke Luck likes.
trans:
鸭子在幸运的勒克喜欢的湖里喝水_x000D_
Luke Luck licks lakes.幸运的勒克喝湖水_x000D_
Luke luck takes licks in lakes duck likes.幸运的勒克在鸭子喜欢的湖里喝水

name: Luke Luck likes lakes.
trans: 幸运的勒克喜欢湖

name: My poor mouth can’t  say that.
trans: 我可怜的嘴巴，说不了那些。

name: My poor mouth is much too slow.
trans: 我可怜的嘴巴，根本跟不上。

name: Bim and Ben lead bands with brooms.
trans: 宾和本都用扫帚指挥。

name: Step this way.
trans: 到这边来吧

name: We’ll find another game to play.
trans: 我们来玩个别的游戏

name: Chewy chewing.
trans: 真好咬

name: Gooey goo for chewy chewing.
trans: 黏稠的胶，真好咬。

name: Here is lots of new blue goo now.
trans: 这儿有很多新鲜的蓝胶

name: what a shame.
trans: 真遗憾

name: This game makes my tongue quite lame.
trans: 我的舌头都僵硬了

name: I hate this game.
trans: 我讨厌这个游戏。

name: Crow’s rose grows some.
trans:
乌鸦的玫瑰就长一长_x000D_
Rose grows.玫瑰长呀长_x000D_
Nose hose goes some.鼻子上的水管喷一喷_x000D_
Hose goes水管喷呀喷

name: Slow Joe Crow comes.
trans: 慢性子的乌鸦乔来了

name: Slow Joe Crow sews Knox in box now.
trans:
慢性子乌鸦乔把诺克斯缝进了盒子里。_x000D_
Sue sews socks of fox in socks now.苏在缝穿袜子的狐狸的袜子_x000D_
Who sees who sew whose new socks?谁看到谁缝谁的新袜子？_x000D_
Who  sews whose socks?谁缝谁的袜子

name: Here’s an easy game to play.
trans:
这儿有个容易的游戏可以玩。_x000D_
Here’s an easy thing to say…这儿有个容易点儿的东西可以说。_x000D_
That’s not easy.这并不容易. 
注： that本该翻译成”那”，但是用在口语中会翻译成“这”.

name: Ticks and tocks滴滴和嗒嗒.
Make a quick trick block stack.
trans:
飞快的把积木堆起来_x000D_
Make a quick trick brick stack.飞快地把砖砖头起来

name: Let’s do tricks with chicks and clocks, sir.
trans:
先生，让我们跟小鸡和时钟一起玩游戏吧
_x000D_
Let’s do tricks with bricks and blocks,sir先生，让我们用砖块和积木一起玩游戏

name: Take it slowly慢慢来.
today is gone今天已经过去了.
We will sleep with our pet Zeep.
trans:
我们会和我们的宠物Zeep一起睡觉_x000D_
It is time to sleep.是时候睡觉了

name:
We will call him Clark我们会叫他Clark_x000D_
He will live at our house.
trans:
他将住在我们家_x000D_
He will grow and grow.他会不断成长_x000D_
We will take hime home.我们会把它带回家

name: We have the only Gack in town.
trans: 我们镇上只有这一个“Gack”

name: At our house, we play out back.
trans: 在我们家，我们在后院玩耍

name: I wave my hand with a big swish swish.
trans: 我挥动手，发出嗖嗖的声音

name: You may swish for fish with my Ish wish dish.
trans:
你可以用我的"Ish"许愿盘子摇晃以换取鱼_x000D_
When I wish to make a wish当我希望许个愿的时候_x000D_
If you wish to wish a wish如果你想许个愿望_x000D_
I have this dish to help me wish.我有这个盘子来帮我许愿

name: On my hand I have a dish.
trans: 在我的手上我有一个盘子

name: they need a hair cut every day.
trans: 他们每天都需要理发。

name: Their hair grows fast他们的头发长得很快.
These yellow pets are called the Zeds.
trans: 这些黄色的宠物被称为Zeds.

name: A mouse has cut the wire.
trans: 一只老鼠咬断了电话线。

name: If you never did, you should.
trans: 如果你从未尝试过，那么你应该试一下。

name: female cow母牛.
Did you ever milk this kind of cow?你曾经挤过这种牛的奶吗？.

Did you every fly a kite in bed?你曾在床上放过风筝吗？_x000D_
Did you ever walk with ten cats on your head?您曾经试过头上顶着十只猫一起行走吗？.
You never yet met a pet你从未见过一只宠物.
then you should那么你应该.
The ink he likes to drink is pink.
trans:
它喜欢喝的墨水是粉色的_x000D_
The thing he likes to drink is ink.它喜欢喝的东西是墨水

name: When he comes in I put him out.
trans: 当他进来时，我把他赶出去

name: All he does is yell ,yell ,yell它所做的就是喊叫，喊叫，喊叫.
We saw some sheep take a walk in their sleep.
trans: 我们看到一些羊在梦游时散步

name:
what good to a Nook is a hook cook book?对于一个小角落来说，一个钩子烹饪书有什么好处呢？_x000D_
We saw a Nook.
trans: 我们看到了一个小角落

name: There must be something there, I fear.
trans: 我担心那里一定有什么东西。

name:
Will you please come over near?你能过来靠近一点吗？_x000D_
Will you please look in my ear?你能帮忙看看我的耳朵吗？.
A lot of things have come to call.
trans: 许多事情来拜访

name: Mike does all the work when the hills get high.
trans: 当山丘变得陡峭时，麦克会全力以赴。

name:
made for为…而设计/制造_x000D_
We like our bike.
trans: It is made for three.我们喜欢我们的自行车。它是为三个人设计的

name: When I pull them in当我把它们收回来时.
My feet stick out of bed all night.
trans:
我的脚整夜都露在床外_x000D_
My head sticks out of bed up here!我的头漏在床外面这里

name: We know a man called Mr.
trans: Gump我们认识一个叫冈普先生的人

name: We have a Wump with just one hump.
trans: just jump on the hump of the Wump of Gump.我们有一只只有一个驼峰的瓦普（wump作者虚构的一个生物）。就跳上冈普的瓦普的驼峰吧。

name: Did you ever ride a …你曾经有没有骑过….
if you like to go Bump! Bump!如果你喜欢颠簸前行.
I wish I Had eleven, too!我希望我也有十一根手指.
This is something new.
trans: 这是一种新的情况

name: How many fingers do I see?我看到多少根手指？.
Not one of them is like another.
trans: 它们中没有一个与另一个相同

name: We see them come.
trans: 我们看到它们来

name: But I bet they have come a long, long way.
trans: 但是我敢打赌它们走了很长很长的路

name: Some have two feet and some have four.
trans: 有些有两只脚，有些有四只。

name:
Thank you for a lot of fun谢谢你带给我这么多欢乐_x000D_
They run for fun in the hot, hot sun.
trans: 它们在炎热的阳光下奔跑，纯粹是为了好玩。

name: Here are some who like to run.
trans: 这里有一些喜欢跑的

name: What a lot of funny things go by.
trans: 真是一大堆有趣的事情

name: funny things are everywhere.
trans: 到处都是有趣的事情

name: The fat one has a yellow hat.
trans: 那个胖子戴着一顶黄色帽子

name: Would you like them here or there?你想让他们在这里还是那里？.
A yawning yellow yak.
trans: 一头打哈欠的黄色牦牛

name: I would recommend spaghetti and meatballs.
trans: 我推荐意大利面和肉丸

name: May I take your order?我能为你点餐吗？.
I’ll be your waiter for tonight.
trans: 今晚我将是你的服务员

name: let’s just listen to this dialogue and we’ll be back later to explain it.
trans: 让我们只听这段对话，稍后我们会回来解释。

name: explain it解释一下.
It also comes in handy spelling ax and extra fox.
trans: 它也在拼写斧子和一只了不起的狐狸时出现

name: Is very very very awful on her violin.
trans: 小提琴拉的非常非常非常糟糕

name: I don’t wanna say anymore.
trans: 我不想再说了

name: Why don’t you give us a littie bit more details?你为什么不给我们更多的细节？.
Today we’re gonna be talking about a restaurant.
trans: 今天我们要说的是餐厅

name: on a tuttle-tuttle tree在一棵龟龟树上.
Ten tired turtles十只精疲力竭的乌龟.
god sick得病了.
sipped six sodas喝掉了六杯苏打水.
Silly Sammy Slick sipped six sodas and got sick sick sick.
trans: 呆头呆脑的萨米.斯利克喝了六瓶苏打水结果得病了

name: Rosy’s going riding on her red rhinoceros.
trans: 罗西要骑上她的犀牛

name: The quick Queen of Quincy and her quacking quacker-oo急匆匆的昆西女王和她那嘎嘎叫的鸭子.
Papa’s in the pail.
trans: 爸爸在桶里

name: Peter Pepper’s puppy.
trans: 彼得.佩珀的小狗

name: Policeman in a pail.
trans: 一个警察在桶里

name: Painting pink pajamas.
trans: 把睡衣刷成粉色

name: You use it when you say: 'Oscar’s only ostrich oiled an orange owl today.'
trans: 当你说‘奥斯卡唯一的鸵鸟今天给一只橙色的猫头鹰刷油漆’的时候，你会用到它。

name: Nine new neckties and a nightshirt and a nose.
trans: 九条新领带和一件睡衣还有一个鼻子

name: Many mumbling mice are making midnight music in the moonlight… mighty nice
trans: 许多喃喃自语的老鼠在月光下演奏小夜曲…非常令人陶醉.

name: midnight music
trans: 午夜音乐.

name: mumbling mice
trans: 喃喃自语的老鼠.

name: Many mumbling mice.
trans: 许多喃喃自语的老鼠

name: Lazy lion licks a lollipop.
trans: 懒惰的狮子在舔棒棒糖

name: Lazy lion
trans: 懒惰的狮子.

name: king’s kerchoo.
trans: 国王的喷嚏

name: Kick a kettle.
trans: 踢飞水壶

name: begin that way.
trans: 这样开始吧。

name: Jerry Jordan’s jelly jar and jam begin that way.
trans: 杰里乔丹的果酱罐和果酱。

name: jelly jar.
trans: 果酱罐

name: Icabod is itchy.
trans: 伊卡博德浑身痒痒

name: Hen in a hat
trans: 帽子里的母鸡.

name: Aunt Annie’s alligator
trans: 安妮阿姨的鳄鱼.

name: Camel on the ceiling
trans: 骆驼在天花板上.

name: dozen doughnuts.
trans: 一打甜甜圈

name: Four fluffy feathers on a Fiffer-feffer-feff.
trans: 四根蓬松的羽毛在菲菲头上
